name: Go Fish Multiplayer
description:
Here comes the first and only Go Fish Multiplayer! Play in real-time against your friends and family with Go Fish Multiplayer!

If you like Poker, Solitaire, Gin Rummy, or Blackjack, you’ll love Go Fish Multiplayer!

Create your own avatar to play and chat in real-time with your friends and family, or play against numerous computer opponents including a mischievous chimp and the card shark bully. Test your memory, have your skills challenged and take down your friends yelling Go Fish all the way to iPhone stardom!

Features Include:
• Create and Customize Your Avatar,
• Multiplayer,
• In-game chat,
• Compare Scores,
• Full Game Tutorial,
• Multiple Locations and Settings,
• Unlimited Hours of Gameplay.

Also check out our other games: America's Next Top Model, Bumper Stars, Finger Physics & Gin Rummy!

Follow us on Twitter @Press_OK for weekly promotions & giveaways!
